name: Aporia (itch)
description:
Aporia is a fps puzzle. An insoluble paradox, an impasse. Time and Space merging.It requires collecting clues to pass on levels.

Aporia is one of the deepest games you will ever play. You are in a non realistic world and you have to follow the clues to pass on the game.

Aporia really shows how life is such an illusion and that when you see reality everything becomes so clear.

Requires a mouse for camera movement and WASD/Arrow keys for movement.
